channel.title: [317] Adding 634 mapping HELP
channel.description:
Will someone help please? I did everything right, gzipped all my .dat files, cache is fine. When i log in on my client it shows where im at all black and then half the map i can see, and then it freezes me. I think it may have to do with somthing in my client.java or OnDemandFetcher, the way i added the codes in, but i fixed the coding in OnDemandFetcher from streamloader to archive and it fixed my errors i had before.
Using Lost Valentino's adding 634 maps tutorial
Someone please help? Greatly appreciated.
